name: Maavra Technologies
tag_list: web-development, phone-development, iphone, iphone-development, iphone-application-development, android, design, website-design, graphic-design
overview:
Maavra Technologies is a web and phone development software company founded in 2009.With unrivaled cutthroat competition in the business arena, technological innovation is imperative for any level of success. Understanding this, MaavraTech aspires to bring to you the best form of Web/Graphic Development in the least costly manner possible. MaavraTech comprises a competent team of highly qualified software developers and programmers with a collective experience of almost thirty years.

Since 2009, MaavraTech has been committed to providing software programming and development services, and now after less than two years, we have grown to become one of the most efficient companies in the field. With a large degree of project transparency and proficiency, in addition to sound communication processes, MaavraTech is making its mark in not only web/graphic development, but our bread and butter is iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone 7 development.
